summary: Different esp plugin files to remove different buggy races from the game.
descriptionHtml:
Uploaded for a friend. We both hated how it constantly rained mammoths and giants after they randomly decided to start walking 10000 feet in the air. I tried and tried to fix the bug. The HKX Havok files yielded no answers, and neither did the race records in Skyrim.esm. Mysterious!

Soooo...this is not a stereotypical bug fix. Since it seems that the giant and mammoth races are beyond repair, this mod removes them entirely from the game.

Giants are changed to frost trolls, and mammoths are changed to cows. The "new" frost trolls are passive, like giants.

There are two esp files (one for each race) so feel free to use one or the other, or both.

The giant remover requires Dawnguard, because of the added frost giants.


To Do:

-Remove the name "Giant" and "Mammoth" from the changed NPCs.
-Make the trolls bigger.



NOTES:

This mod will likely cause issues with mods that add duplicates of the giant race. You've been warned.

If you load a saved game after installing a mod and find bugged trolls and cows, try disabling them and then enabling them using console commands. That irons them out.
author: DumdogsWorld
